original_title: 303 กลัว กล้า อาฆาต
overview: St. George's School is a Catholic school with very strict rules. A group of students hear rumors of a mysterious suicide case of an honor student whose name is engraved in a frame in the middle of the school hall. Out of curiosity, a group of students try to find out the truth. It started with playing Peekaew , which has ice, which is also the teacher's daughter. But in the end, the students gradually died one by one.
tagline: Conquer the FEAR. Keep the FAITH. Kill the REVENGE.
title: 303 Fear Faith Revenge
